vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for installation of solar photovoltaic and battery energy storage system at Bachman Recreation Center located at 2750 Bachman Drive - Ameresco, Inc., most advantageous proposer of three - Not to exceed $975,000.00 - Financing:  Capital Construction Fund
